author: drobinson
msg: Cleaned up message renderer code and consolidated rendering logic for server-side and client-side validation into single block.  Removed duplicate spans for client-side validation, so issues with duplicate messages should be resolved.  Also cleaned up default style for messages to remove the use of p_OraDisplayBlock from OraInlineInfoText style, so strange layout behavior should be resolve in IE.

author: bdelacretaz
msg: SLING-82 - CreateNodeTest added, POSTs a new node and verifies its unformatted content

author: jfclere
msg: Add the tests of the cookies.

author: andreas
msg: Added configuration option to use relative URLs in ProxyModule
